title: Revert "Add more params to the evaluation pass stops"

commit.message:
Revert "Add more params to the evaluation pass stops"

This reverts commit e9946d0e7aec542587cc2f374abcf544e85d5e47.

nodes.body:
> Are we planning to bring this back, or just chalking it up as an experiment that didn't pan out?

The msbuild diagnostic logging covers most of this. So not planning to bring it back unless you see value for it. 

Could @Forgind or @rainersigwald please merge this in? I do not have permissions to this repo.

> Are we planning to bring this back, or just chalking it up as an experiment that didn't pan out?

I think it can be useful, but having something that worsens perf (whether or not ETW traces are enabled) and gives specious results is harmful. I'd say it's something to bring back but with fairly low priority.
